//NUMGAME
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--){
		int N;
		scanf("%d", &N);
		int a[N];
		int b[N];
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)scanf("%d", &b[i]);
		sort(a,a+N, greater<int>());
		sort(b,b+N, greater<int>());
		int count = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++){
			if(b[count] >= a[i]){
				count++;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", count);
	}
	return 0;
}
